main.name: Raj Tandukar
main.description: and a graduate from University of Western Australia
main.bio:
I'm a data specialist with a keen interest in software engineering and a Masters degree in Data Science.My focus as a data specialist is to leverage my technical expertise to help businesses make informed decisions based on data-driven insights. I have a strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL, and I am adept at using various tools and frameworks such as R Shiny, Power BI, and Apache Spark.
As a data specialist, I have the ability to collect, analyze, and interpret complex data sets and translate them into meaningful insights that help businesses optimize their operations and drive growth. I am highly detail-oriented and possess excellent problem-solving skills, which enable me to identify patterns, trends, and outliers in large data sets.

My ultimate goal is to continue to expand my knowledge and skills in data science and software engineering, and leverage my expertise to help businesses optimize their data management processes and drive growth through data-driven insight

work.title: Data Engineer
work.description:
* Deployed Data Divers OWC framework (Infrastructure as a Code) to snip up a new Azure Data Platform.
 * Implemented CI/CD pipelines to promote environments for ADF and Data Warehouse.

work.title: Data Engineer
work.description:
* Deployed Data Divers OWC framework (Infrastructure as a Code) to snip up a new Azure Data Platform.
 * Implemented CI/CD pipelines to promote environments for ADF and Data Warehouse.
* Migrated Over 14 Databases, above 220 tables and data models within a limited timeframe.

work.title: Data Engineer/ Architect
work.description:
* Working with Power BI report builder to deliver inspection assessment paginated reports for huge number of stake holders.
 * Building Image compression pipelines using Databricks and Azure Data Factory.
* Assessment of power BI report builder to understand its limitations for high scale report delivery.
* Assessing Logic Apps for controlled delivery of massive sized Pdf's and Excel Reports.

work.title: Data Specialist
work.description:
* Assisted on development of data environment using Synapse Microsoft Azure.
*Productionizing current Synapse environment, Reverse engineering the production pipelines to establish Synapse Dev environment.
* Data architecture and Synapse BAU monitoring & usage documentation.
* R shiny and Azure Container service to build an interactive Maps dashboard 
* Used Power BI to upgrade current export dashboard.
* Used Python for internal data tranformation and testing.

work.title: Data Analyst/ Engineer
work.description: Exploring large datasets to discover trends and patterns with the view of extracting relevant business insights, and Developing new reports as the need arises in partnership with the Data Analysts including data input, data compilation, data checking and elementary data visualisation

work.title: Data Scientist
work.description: Building a model to determine the optimum rate of Potassium and Sulphur fertilizer which is used to maximize the crop yield considering various factors using historical yield..

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: Developed a project for government of Southern Railways, India included website and android application with a team of 10 being presently operated by inspectors of India tracking over 5000 locos and co-locos in over 15 districts of Tamilnadu, India.

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: Constructed an android application for proper Flight Data Management, currently in use by 80% Domestic Airlines of Nepal.

projects.title: Rotaract Club of Himalaya Patan
projects.description: Developed and deployed a website for the Rotary club of himalaya Patan. Rotary club of Himalaya Patan is a non profit organisation based on Kathmandu, Nepal. This website was developed as their representation portal and now is hosted and active.

projects.title: Essay Marking Assistant
projects.description: Automated Essay Scoring (AES) or Automated Essay Grading (AEG) refers to a challenging Natural Language Processing task (NLP) which involves evaluation of descriptive answer scripts to provide a legitimate human equivalent result.

projects.title: Automatic Answer Evaluation
projects.description: Conducted and published a research project with a team of five, to develop an intelligent system to  evaluate descriptive answers. The technical expertise of Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning  were exploited in this project.

projects.title: Virtual Book
projects.description: Acquired first place developing “Virtual Book”, a Cross-Platform application with Unity coded in C# and  Vuforia database as back-end. The concept behind the development of this application is for users to get  a clear understanding of what writer is trying to imply. This application detects image of writer’s content  and plays a video above it.

Extras.user: University of Western Australia , Perth, WA / 2020
